name: SARIS Smoke Tree Floral Water (Cotinus coggygria)
description: SARIS Smoke Tree Floral Water (Cotinus coggygria) is a natural smoke tree water produced by the distillation of smoke tree.Ingredients: distilled water and smoke tree oil from Cotinus coggygriaApplication and benefits:has antibacterial, anti-fungal and anti-inflammatory propertiessoothes coughs, gingivitisinsects repellentespecially valuable natural gift for women: douches with tetra water help with vaginal infections (white flow), cystitis, as well as faster healing of wounds and stitches after childbirthgargling is recommended for the prevention of oral hygiene - bad breath, inflamed gums, periodontitis, cold sores or herpesexternal rinsing with sumac water helps with problems such as hemorrhoids, atopic dermatitis
